word: Let wisdom utter her voice, let her mark out the path. "Her ways are ways of pleasantness, and all her paths are peace" (Proverbs 3:17). "The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom" (Proverbs 9:10). Whoever loves God supremely and his neighbor as himself is keeping the commandments of God. Although he has to meet the annoyances that will come from a fallen world, yet he is not discouraged, because Christ has said, "I have overcome the world."
